archimate:Device.name: Clinical Workflow AIO Desktop (CWD)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Clinical areas (Nursing stations, Emergency, Medical & Surgical wards, Maternity, Paediatrics, Outpatient Clinics) • Clinical documentation, EMR/EHR access, patient management, lab results, medication orders, PACS viewer.
Specifications:
• Processor type: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 • Memory capacity: 32GB • Storage options: 512 GB–1 TB SSD • Integrated Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6E & Bluetooth 5.2 – Reduces reliance on wired connections for flexibility. • Graphics capability: Integrated graphics. DICOM Calibration for Radiology • Expansion slots and ports: USB-A (x4), USB-C (x2), HDMI output, DisplayPort, audio jack, Gigabit Ethernet, barcode scanner port • Form factor: Integrated medical-grade casing, antimicrobial surfaces, 24–27 inches • Power supply rating: Integrated PSU, 120–150W energy-efficient. Hot-Swappable Battery Backup • Cooling system: Quiet, fan-based cooling (medical environment friendly). Fanless Cooling System • Operating system compatibility: Windows 11 Pro, healthcare-specific optimizations • Monitor specs: 27 inches, Full HD (1920x1080) or QHD (2560x1440), IPS panel, touchscreen, antimicrobial coatings. Display Output (HDMI 2.1 or DisplayPort 1.4) • Protective Equipment: Medical-grade screen protector, antimicrobial keyboard cover, rugged mounting options • Included peripherals: Mouse and Keyboard • Security Features: RFID or biometric authentication for secure login/logout Privacy screen filter integrated or attached TPM 2.0 security module for encryption of patient data Compliant with HIPAA and relevant data security standards.
